item.title: The Hingehiker's Guide to the Hinge Hellscape
item.description: Opinions are my own and certainly not held by my employer A Call to Action It’s 2020, Covid is on the upsurge, a divisive election looms on the horizon, and the downfall of democracy seems all but inevitable. Flicking through Instagram, the following ad appears on your screen. It’s a call to action, a shining, golden arm gloriously beckoning amidst the chaos. Hello, old friend Fulfilling your duty as a heroic individual, you download and open the app.
